name: AGRICULTURAL AND RURAL CONVENTION
goal:
Informing and make training for non-profit making organisations and NGOs in farming, food, environmental, rural, trade, public health, research areas and policies at the European Union (EU) and global levels, by all means and media;

Stimulating and managing the networking of activities and synergies among non-profit making organisations and NGOs in farming, food, environmental, rural, trade, public health, research areas and policies, both at the EU and global levels, by all means and media;

Facilitating the participation of civil society organisations, NGOs and non-profit making organisations to public consultations and dialogue with public authorities in farming, food, environmental, rural, trade, public health and research areas and policies, both at the EU and global levels, by all means and media.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Economic and Financial Affairs, Environment, Food Safety, Public Health, Research and Technology, Trade
euInitiatives: Common Agricultural Policy, Multiannual financial framework, and other food, health, research and trade policies
